context: I like the movie Superbad. Who was in that movie?
Super bad was starred by Stacy Edwards,Seth Rogen and Martin Starr.
Superbad is a comedy classic for me. I forgot Stacy Edwards was in the movie. What year did the movie come out?
I don't have that information, but I recommend Pineapple express and kung Fu Panda 2. They were directed by the same director.
Pineapple Express is so funny. Who is the director of that movie?
resp: Seth Rogen. He wrote The Watch and produced This is the end.
